title: IWeldmentTrimExtendFeatureData.SetTrimmingBoundary
description: Sets the trimming boundaries for this weldment trim extend feature.
returns: Array of trimming boundaries: Solid bodies created by weldment members - or - Planar faces on non-weldment members, or planar faces on weldment members, or both See Remarks.
remarks:
Faces are valid for end-trim corner types only. You can only specify multiple trimming boundaries for end-trim corner types. Use
IWeldmentTrimExtendFeatureData::CornerType
to determine the type of corner.
You must set the
bodies to trim
and set the trimming boundary if changing a corner type.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
